context: Samsara Inc. is a IoT platform for physical operations focused on fleet management, equipment monitoring, and industrial IoT. IPO. Fleet management and safety features.

competitors.name: Geotab
competitors.notes: Market leader in fleet telematics with comprehensive data analytics platform. By 2020, Geotab had established significant market presence with millions of connected vehicles and strong focus on data insights and scalability for larger fleets.

competitors.name: Motive
competitors.notes: Formerly KeepTruckin, Motive offered an all-in-one platform with robust ELD compliance, asset tracking, and driver safety tools. Strong competitor in the transportation sector with emphasis on regulatory compliance and driver safety.

competitors.name: Verizon Connect
competitors.notes: Enterprise-focused fleet management with telecommunications infrastructure backing. Provided GPS tracking, vehicle maintenance alerts, performance reporting, and asset monitoring, particularly strong with large enterprise fleets.

competitors.name: Lytx
competitors.notes: Leader in video-based telematics and AI-driven fleet safety solutions. Offered unparalleled visibility into driver behavior through video telematics and advanced machine vision technology.

competitors.name: Trimble
competitors.notes: Diversified technology company competing with integrated hardware and software solutions, particularly strong in construction and transportation verticals. Offered comprehensive asset management and field service solutions.

competitors.name: ORBCOMM
competitors.notes: IoT and M2M solutions provider with satellite and cellular telematics. Competed in fleet tracking and asset monitoring with global connectivity capabilities.

competitors.name: GPS Insight
competitors.notes: Fleet management software and GPS tracking provider competing in the commercial telematics market with established customer base.

competitors.name: Spireon
competitors.notes: Connected vehicle intelligence platform offering fleet tracking, asset tracking, and stolen vehicle recovery solutions.

competitors.name: ZTR Control Systems
competitors.notes: Fleet management and telematics solutions provider competing in similar verticals with focus on asset tracking and vehicle monitoring.

competitors.name: Google Cloud IoT
competitors.notes: Technology giant offering IoT platform services that overlapped with Samsara's industrial IoT capabilities, particularly in data analytics and cloud infrastructure.
